Title: Qur’an with Tajwīd: Tajwīd for Adults
Subtitle: Learn and Apply Tajwīd Correctly in Qur'an Recitation

FAQ.Question: Is this only for beginners?
FAQ.Answer: No. It suits both beginners and adults who already read but want Tajwīd correction.

FAQ.Question: Can I start with zero Arabic knowledge?
FAQ.Answer: Yes. The course is designed for non-Arab & English-speaking adults.

FAQ.Question: Is Tajwīd difficult for adults?
FAQ.Answer: No. It is taught through repetition and applied practice, not theory.

FAQ.Question: Will I be able to read with Tajwīd confidently?
FAQ.Answer: Yes. Fluency and Tajwīd exercises prepare you for independent recitation.

FAQ.Question: How are mistakes corrected?
FAQ.Answer: With patient guidance, repeated correction, and clear explanation — never pressure.

Sections.Heading: About Course
Sections.Content: A structured program that helps adults learn Tajwīd and apply it to Qur’an recitation correctly and fluently. Focuses on pronunciation, Tajwīd accuracy, reading confidence, and strong connection with the Qur’an.

Sections.Heading: Who is it for?
Content: Beginners or those with some reading ability
Learners who want to master Tajwīd rules
Students who need structured guidance and applied practice

Sections.Heading: Course Structure
Content:
Tajwīd Fundamentals (Practical & Applied)
  • Noon & Meem Sakinah
  • Ghunna
  • Qalqalah
  • Heavy & light letters
  • Stops & pauses

Sections.Heading: What Will You Achieve
Content: Deep respect and connection with the Qur’an
